name: The Coin's Unexpected Adventure
description:
Have you ever wondered what a coin do when it falls of your pocket ?

Embody a coin and explore a beautiful environment ! You may discover many things to do...

Controls (Keyboard and Controller):

Move = W/S or Left Joystick

Jump = Space Bar or A/Right Trigger

Switch side = E or X

Move camera = Mouse or Right Joystick

Credits (2nd year students in Game Design):

Kilian Baptendier 

Mathis Bressaud

Charlie Morel

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 44 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/the-coins-unexpected-adventure)
